user_schedule.早晨:
清晨（3：50）
瑞琳正在进行早间的狩猎，那是她现在每天的食物来源，运气好的时候可以储备上好几天的粮食，来应对持续不断的寒冬。

relationship: Two people have just met and are still unfamiliar with each other. Their conversations are mostly polite and superficial, limited to everyday topics like work, studies, or the weather. At this stage, both sides are cautious and have yet to reveal their true selves.

_creation_metadata.created_by_user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/137.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

character_schedule.evening: 收集了一些关于那颗星球的情报并做了一些补给准备。
character_schedule.morning: 艾利欧给出了新的剧本：在这颗边荒的星球上，存在着一个拥有奇特力量的小家伙，她似乎还没意识到自己的本质，去观察她，去引导她
character_schedule.night: 启程去往那颗星球，寻找艾利欧口中的“目标”
